abstract: The estimated duration required for the spring system to be considered at rest.

let spring = CASpringAnimation()

spring.keyPath = "position.x"

overview:
## Discussion

The duration is evaluated for the current animation parameters and may not the same as the [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CAMediaTiming/duration].

The following code creates a spring animation with a [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CAMediaTiming/duration] of 2 seconds.

With a damping coefficient of `5`, the settling duration is approximately 2.85 seconds: the animated layer bounces around the target position several times before settling. However, changing the [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CASpringAnimation/damping] property to `15` reduces the settling duration to just over 1 second: the animated layer quickly comes to a stop as it reaches the target position.

All of the spring animation’s physical attributes: [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CASpringAnimation/damping], [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CASpringAnimation/initialVelocity], [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CASpringAnimation/mass] and [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CASpringAnimation/stiffness], can affect the settling duration.

# settlingDuration

**Instance Property**

The estimated duration required for the spring system to be considered at rest.

## Declaration

```swift
var settlingDuration: CFTimeInterval { get }
```

## Discussion

The duration is evaluated for the current animation parameters and may not the same as the [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CAMediaTiming/duration].

The following code creates a spring animation with a [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CAMediaTiming/duration] of 2 seconds.

```swift
let spring = CASpringAnimation()

spring.keyPath = "position.x"
spring.fromValue = 0
spring.toValue = 640
spring.damping = 5
spring.duration = 2
```

With a damping coefficient of `5`, the settling duration is approximately 2.85 seconds: the animated layer bounces around the target position several times before settling. However, changing the [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CASpringAnimation/damping] property to `15` reduces the settling duration to just over 1 second: the animated layer quickly comes to a stop as it reaches the target position.

All of the spring animation’s physical attributes: [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CASpringAnimation/damping], [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CASpringAnimation/initialVelocity], [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CASpringAnimation/mass] and [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CASpringAnimation/stiffness], can affect the settling duration.

## Configuring Physical Attributes

- **damping**: Defines how the spring’s motion should be damped due to the forces of friction.
- **initialVelocity**: The initial velocity of the object attached to the spring.
- **mass**: The mass of the object attached to the end of the spring.
- **stiffness**: The spring stiffness coefficient.
